episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0100:
Yay! We did it! I think we’ve finally sated
Snorlax’s appetite!
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0400:
I can’t believe we helped the legendary Trainer
Red! And here in the woods, of all places!
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0500:
OK! Now that we’re done with that, it’s time for us
to fill our bellies, too!
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0600:
We have some mushrooms left over. Um... Red,
would you like to join us for dinner?
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0700:
I’ll whip up a bunch of dishes that’ll make these
ingredients shine!
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_0900: Oh, come on! Stop being so selfish!
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1000:
I haven’t got any more Berries for you to eat, so
stop nagging, OK? Plus, didn’t you just eat a
whole bunch of ’em earlier?
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1100: Oh, it’s Marnie! But look at Morpeko...
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1200:
That’s strange... There’s usually loads of Berries
around here.
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1500:
Yeah. She’s talking about the Berries we just fed
to Snorlax, isn’t she?
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1700:
OK, already. I’ll look around a bit more, so
calm down.
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1800: Sometimes it’s hard to share nature’s bounty, huh.
episode_event_autumn_2021/6901_1001_1900:
Well, only one thing for us to do! Let’s help Marnie
find some Berries for Morpeko!
